title: Why
body: Do people act like normals are their Diamond promotion series?

replies.body:
They are just people trying to have fun.

Hitler was also just a person.

Why do you have to ruin their fun like that.

Tell me why:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_j6IBdHW_rY

There are always "those people" when you run promotions, can't help it, such is the way of LoL's promotions.
